synopsis.text:
Coconna and Vanilla embark on a nostalgic journey as a celebration of their 25th anniversary, guided by Gotho, who leads them to revisit the memorable locations once shared with Chirico Cuvie from the original Armored Trooper Votoms series. As they reminisce and reconnect with old acquaintances, an ancient prophecy spanning 3000 years unexpectedly intertwines with their adventure.

In hopes of finding Chirico, the trio returns to Uoodo, where they encounter a red-shouldered AT at the Battling arena. This new six-volume video series marks the final chapter in the franchise, 26 years after the original combat robotic mecha anime aired. Prepare for a heartwarming and thrilling ride filled with rekindled friendships, nostalgia, and unforeseen revelations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
